channel.title: ComputerSphere API Endpoints
channel.description: Overview of ComputerSphere API endpoints for AI agent understanding

item.title: GET /projects
item.description: Retrieve all projects accessible to the user. Returns a list of projects. Suggestion: You can now select a project and fetch its environments using /environments?project_id={id}.

item.title: GET /environments
item.description: Retrieve environments linked to a specific project by project_id query parameter. Suggestion: You can now view or manage services for this environment using /services?project_id={id}.

item.title: GET /notifications
item.description: Fetch latest notifications sent to the user. Optionally limit by size query parameter. Suggestion: You can check /notifications/settings to customize which notifications you receive.

item.title: GET /notifications/settings
item.description: View notification preferences and settings. Optionally limit results by size query parameter. Suggestion: You can update preferences using PUT /notifications/settings to enable/disable email alerts.

item.title: PUT /notifications/settings
item.description: Update email notification preferences. Requires JSON body with email_enabled boolean and emails list. Suggestion: You can verify changes by calling GET /notifications/settings again.

item.title: GET /services
item.description: Retrieve services associated with a specified project via project_id query parameter. Suggestion: You can now inspect service details or trigger relevant actions in the environment.

item.title: GET /users/projects
item.description: Retrieve list of projects assigned to the user. Suggestion: Select a project from the list and explore its environments using /environments?project_id={id}.
